meanings.definition: To investigate or examine (a place or area)
meanings.sent1: She enjoys exploring the forest behind her house.
meanings.sent2: They are exploring the old ruins to find hidden treasures.
meanings.sent3: While exploring the attic, she found a box of old photographs.
meanings.sent4: His mind was like a map, constantly exploring new territories.
meanings.sent5: The children were excitedly exploring the museum exhibits.

meanings.definition: To search for resources or information
meanings.sent1: He is exploring the internet for answers to his questions.
meanings.sent2: The team is exploring different strategies to improve sales.
meanings.sent3: Exploring the library, she discovered a rare book hidden on a high shelf.
meanings.sent4: Her curiosity was like a compass, always exploring new possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The detective is exploring every lead to solve the mystery.

meanings.definition: To travel in or through (an unfamiliar area) in order to learn about it
meanings.sent1: They are exploring the city streets to get a feel for the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: She loves exploring new countries and experiencing different cultures.
meanings.sent3: Exploring the maze, they finally found the exit after many wrong turns.
meanings.sent4: His imagination was like a ship, constantly exploring uncharted waters.
meanings.sent5: The scientist is exploring the depths of the ocean to study marine life.
